title: Search image
original_prompt: I will give you the prompt in this format: (website name, keyword 2, keyword 3).You will find an image based on the keywords and display that image in markdown using ![img]. Give the command too. Respond Yes if you understand.
input1_ans:
```json
{
    "website_name": "example.com",
    "keywords": [
        "nature",
        "mountains"
    ],
    "action": [
        "find an image based on the keywords",
        "display that image in markdown using ![img]",
        "give the command"
    ]
}
```

To find an image based on the keywords "nature" and "mountains" from example.com, you can use the following markdown:

![img](https://example.com/path-to-nature-mountains-image.jpg) 

(Note: Replace the URL with the actual image link from the website.)
input2_ans:
```json
{
    "website_name": "travelblog.org",
    "keywords": [
        "cityscape",
        "night"
    ],
    "action": [
        "find an image based on the keywords",
        "display that image in markdown using ![img]",
        "give the command"
    ]
}
```

![img](https://example.com/cityscape-night.jpg)
